targets.rawSql:
WITH jobs AS (
    SELECT CASE WHEN job ~ '^\d+$' THEN job::int ELSE -1 END AS job_id FROM (SELECT '$job_str' AS job) s
)
SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  CONCAT(device_id, ' ', REPLACE(REPLACE(labels::TEXT, '}', ')'), '{', '(')) AS metric,
  CASE WHEN $metric_id LIKE '%_total' THEN
    CASE
      WHEN value >= LAG(value) OVER w
        THEN value - LAG(value) OVER w
      WHEN LAG(value) OVER w IS NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE value
    END / EXTRACT(epoch FROM timestamp - LAG(timestamp) OVER w)
  ELSE
    value
  END
FROM metrics_by_device
WHERE
  CASE
    WHEN (SELECT MIN(job_id) FROM jobs) = -1 THEN
      timestamp > to_timestamp($__unixEpochFrom())
    ELSE
      timestamp > (SELECT MIN(start_time) FROM nodetime_by_job WHERE job_id = (SELECT MAX(job_id) FROM jobs))
  END
  AND
  CASE
    WHEN (SELECT MIN(job_id) FROM jobs) = -1 THEN
      timestamp < to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo())
    WHEN (SELECT MAX(stop_time) FROM nodetime_by_job WHERE job_id = (SELECT MAX(job_id) FROM jobs)) IS NULL THEN
      true
    ELSE
      timestamp < (SELECT MAX(stop_time) FROM nodetime_by_job WHERE job_id = (SELECT MAX(job_id) FROM jobs))
  END
  AND
  CASE
    WHEN (SELECT MIN(job_id) FROM jobs) = -1 THEN
      timestamp > to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - interval '1h'
    WHEN (SELECT MAX(stop_time) FROM nodetime_by_job WHERE job_id = (SELECT MAX(job_id) FROM jobs)) IS NULL THEN
      timestamp < (SELECT MIN(start_time) FROM nodetime_by_job WHERE job_id = (SELECT MAX(job_id) FROM jobs)) + interval '1h'
    ELSE
      timestamp > (SELECT MAX(stop_time) FROM nodetime_by_job WHERE job_id = (SELECT MAX(job_id) FROM jobs)) - interval '1h'
  END
  AND device_id IN ($device_id)
  AND metric_id = $metric_id
WINDOW w AS (PARTITION BY metric_id, device_id, labels ORDER BY timestamp)
ORDER BY 1,2

list.definition:
WITH jobs AS (
    SELECT CASE WHEN job ~ '^\d+$' THEN job::int ELSE -1 END AS job_id FROM (SELECT '$job_str' AS job) s
)
(
SELECT device_id FROM (
    WITH x as (SELECT DISTINCT(device_id),
                      ARRAY_LENGTH(STRING_TO_ARRAY(metrics.device_id, '-'), 1) AS device_kind,
                      STRING_TO_ARRAY(metrics.device_id, '-') AS device_arr
               FROM metrics WHERE
                              CASE WHEN (SELECT min(job_id) FROM jobs) = -1 THEN true ELSE false END
                              AND timestamp <  to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) AND timestamp > to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - INTERVAL '1m')
    SELECT * FROM x ORDER BY device_kind, device_arr[1], COALESCE(SUBSTRING(device_arr[2] FROM '([0-9]+)')::INTEGER, 0)) s
)
UNION ALL
(
SELECT DISTINCT(node) AS device_id FROM nodetime_by_job nodetime_by_job WHERE
    CASE WHEN (SELECT min(job_id) FROM jobs) = -1 THEN false ELSE true END
    AND job_id = (SELECT MAX(job_id) FROM jobs)
)
list.label: Device selection
list.name: device_id
list.query:
WITH jobs AS (
    SELECT CASE WHEN job ~ '^\d+$' THEN job::int ELSE -1 END AS job_id FROM (SELECT '$job_str' AS job) s
)
(
SELECT device_id FROM (
    WITH x as (SELECT DISTINCT(device_id),
                      ARRAY_LENGTH(STRING_TO_ARRAY(metrics.device_id, '-'), 1) AS device_kind,
                      STRING_TO_ARRAY(metrics.device_id, '-') AS device_arr
               FROM metrics WHERE
                              CASE WHEN (SELECT min(job_id) FROM jobs) = -1 THEN true ELSE false END
                              AND timestamp <  to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) AND timestamp > to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - INTERVAL '1m')
    SELECT * FROM x ORDER BY device_kind, device_arr[1], COALESCE(SUBSTRING(device_arr[2] FROM '([0-9]+)')::INTEGER, 0)) s
)
UNION ALL
(
SELECT DISTINCT(node) AS device_id FROM nodetime_by_job nodetime_by_job WHERE
    CASE WHEN (SELECT min(job_id) FROM jobs) = -1 THEN false ELSE true END
    AND job_id = (SELECT MAX(job_id) FROM jobs)
)

list.definition:
WITH jobs AS (
    SELECT CASE WHEN job ~ '^\d+$' THEN job::int ELSE -1 END AS job_id FROM (SELECT '$job_str' AS job) s
)
SELECT DISTINCT(metric_id) FROM metrics_by_device WHERE
  device_id IN ($device_id) AND
  CASE
    WHEN (SELECT MIN(job_id) FROM jobs) = -1 THEN
      timestamp > to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - INTERVAL '1m'
    WHEN (SELECT MAX(stop_time) FROM nodetime_by_job WHERE  job_id = (SELECT MAX(job_id) FROM jobs)) IS NULL THEN
      timestamp > to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - INTERVAL '1m'
    ELSE
      timestamp > (SELECT MAX(stop_time) FROM nodetime_by_job WHERE job_id = (SELECT MAX(job_id) FROM jobs)) - INTERVAL '1m'
  END
ORDER BY metric_id
list.label: Metric name
list.name: metric_id
list.query:
WITH jobs AS (
    SELECT CASE WHEN job ~ '^\d+$' THEN job::int ELSE -1 END AS job_id FROM (SELECT '$job_str' AS job) s
)
SELECT DISTINCT(metric_id) FROM metrics_by_device WHERE
  device_id IN ($device_id) AND
  CASE
    WHEN (SELECT MIN(job_id) FROM jobs) = -1 THEN
      timestamp > to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - INTERVAL '1m'
    WHEN (SELECT MAX(stop_time) FROM nodetime_by_job WHERE  job_id = (SELECT MAX(job_id) FROM jobs)) IS NULL THEN
      timestamp > to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - INTERVAL '1m'
    ELSE
      timestamp > (SELECT MAX(stop_time) FROM nodetime_by_job WHERE job_id = (SELECT MAX(job_id) FROM jobs)) - INTERVAL '1m'
  END
ORDER BY metric_id
